questions.question: What does a red octagonal traffic sign mean?
questions.explanation: A red octagonal sign is universally recognized as a stop sign.

questions.question: What does a flashing yellow traffic light indicate?
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow light means you must proceed with caution.

questions.question: What does a green arrow displayed on a traffic light mean?
options: Proceed in the direction of the arrow if it is safe to do so
Stop and wait for green light
questions.correctAnswer: Proceed in the direction of the arrow if it is safe to do so
questions.explanation: A green arrow means you may proceed in the direction the arrow points, if it is safe to do so.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers of upcoming road conditions and hazards.

questions.question: What is the speed limit in a residential area unless otherwise posted?
questions.explanation: The default speed limit in residential areas is 25 mph unless otherwise posted.

questions.question: When parking uphill with a curb, which way should your front wheels be turned?
questions.explanation: When parking uphill with a curb, turn your front wheels away from the curb to prevent the car from rolling into traffic if the brakes fail.

questions.question: When driving in fog, what should you use?
questions.explanation: Use low beam headlights in fog, high beams will reflect back and impair visibility.

questions.question: Who has the right-of-way at an intersection where two drivers arrive at the same time at a right angle?
options: The driver who is going straight
questions.explanation: At an intersection where two drivers arrive at the same time at a right angle, the driver on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: What should you do if you encounter a school bus with flashing red lights while driving?
options: Continue driving at the same speed
questions.explanation: Flashing red lights on a school bus mean children are getting on or off the bus. You must stop.

questions.question: What does a 'No Parking' sign look like?
options: Red and white with a 'P' symbol
Yellow and black with a 'P' symbol
White and black with a 'P' symbol crossed out
Green and white with a 'P' symbol
questions.correctAnswer: White and black with a 'P' symbol crossed out
questions.explanation: A 'No Parking' sign is white and black with a 'P' symbol crossed out.
